Animal Friendship

Level 1 Enchantment Spell

Convince a beast not to attack you.

The creature must have an Intelligence of 3 or less. Condition ends early if you or an ally hurts the target. In higher difficulty modes, the target might become hostile when the spell ends.

Animal Friendship is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Animal Friendship is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Enchantment school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

BG3 Animal Friendship Information

Description: Convince a beast not to attack you. The creature must have an Intelligence of 3 or less. Condition ends early if you or an ally hurts the target. When the spell ends, the target might become hostile. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Enchantment School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: Wisdom

How to Acquire Animal Friendship in Baldur's Gate 3

Animal Friendship can be acquired by the following classes:

Bard Druid Ranger Nature Domain (Cleric Subclass)

Animal Friendship can be cast by using the following Items:

Beastmaster's Chain

Animal Friendship Tips & Notes in BG3

Can be used in dialogue as well to inflict charm and gain advantage on charisma checks. (Does not make them submissive, just easier to manipulate. ) Notes & Tips go here
